nature_language: [当前位置南京,目标位置杭州,旅行人数2,旅行天数3] 我和姐姐想在中秋假期从南京去杭州玩3天，我们想多逛当地的博物馆和知名景点，怎么规划行程？
nature_language_en: [Current location: Nanjing, Destination: Hangzhou, Number of travelers: 2, Number of travel days: 3] My sister and I want to travel from Nanjing to Hangzhou for 3 days during the Mid-Autumn Festival. We would like to visit local museums and famous attractions. How should we plan our itinerary?
